org.grouplens.lenskit.basic

Class PrecomputedItemScorer.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.PrecomputedItemScorer.Builder

    PrecomputedItemScorer

    public static class PrecomputedItemScorer.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for mock item scorers.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrecomputedItemScorer.Builder

        public PrecomputedItemScorer.Builder()

    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        public PrecomputedItemScorer.Builder addUser(long user,
                                    SparseVector usv)
        Add an user's entire score vector to the mock scorer.
        Parameters:
        user - The user.
        usv - The vector of scores to use. This will replace any previously-added scores.
        Returns:
        The builder (for chaining).

      • addScore

        public PrecomputedItemScorer.Builder addScore(long user,
                                     long item,
                                     double score)
        Add a score. When the item is scored for the user, the mock scorer will return this score.
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        item - The item ID.
        score - The score to return.
        Returns:
        The builder (for chaining).

      • build

        public PrecomputedItemScorer build()
        Construct the mock item scorer. This will empty the builder.
        Returns:
        A mock item scorer that will return the configured scores.
